name: Acey Ducey
overview: Published in the type-in book, "BASIC Computer Games - Microcomputer Edition". This is a simulation of the Acey Ducey card game. In the game, the computer dealer deals 2 cards face up. You have an option to bet or not bet depending on whether or not you feel the next card dealt with have a value between the first two. You start with $100 and can alter line 110 if you want to start with more.
